attributes.action: sort out once and for all the unnrealistic demands the csa put on the non resident parent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Its time for the csa to take into account all real living costs like gas, electric, water, tv licence, food ,clothing , council tax etc. does this govenment think that because your a non resident parent you dont need to pay for any of these things because you would be wrong .
its time to sort this incompetent agency out because its disgraceful. The non resident parent and there new familys are entitled to live aswell, but all that is taken into account is rent/morgage (if anyone can afford one) and pensions its time to take all important bills into account anyone who feels the same please sign below

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
